publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3220 Mr Lloyd Quinan: Holyrood Project and Israeli Goods-That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Parliamentary Corporate Body and the Holyrood Progress Group not to source goods or services for the Holyrood Project from any company trading with the state of Israel.
S1M-3220 Holyrood Project and Israeli Goods (lodged on 14 June 2002) Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Gil Paterson*
S1M-3220 Holyrood Project and Israeli Goods (lodged on 14 June 2002) Tommy Sheridan*
